text: I tol'ko Allakh - Tot, kto, okazyvaya milost' Svoim rabam, posylayet dozhd', spasayushchiy ikh ot nedoroda posle otchayaniya i sil'noy zasukhi, i nizvodit blagodat' dozhdya na rasteniya, plody, zhivotnykh, stepi i gory. I tol'ko On - Tot, kto ustraivayet dela Svoikh rabov. On dostoin khvaly za Yego milosti k nim i za vso, chto On vershit
